name: LG InstaView Door-in-Door Refrigerator
description: 31 cu. ft. smart refrigerator with InstaView Door-in-Door design, allowing you to see inside without opening the door. Features a sleek stainless steel finish and advanced cooling technology.

name: Whirlpool French Door Refrigerator
description: 25 cu. ft. French door refrigerator with adjustable shelves, humidity-controlled crispers, and an external water and ice dispenser. Energy Star certified for efficiency.

name: Haier Quad Door Refrigerator
description: 16.4 cu. ft. quad door refrigerator with convertible zone, allowing you to switch between fridge and freezer as needed. Features a modern black stainless steel finish.

name: Samsung Family Hub Refrigerator
description: 27.7 cu. ft. smart refrigerator with a built-in touchscreen and cameras inside. Connect to your smartphone to see contents, manage groceries, and control other smart home devices.

name: LG Side-by-Side Refrigerator
description: 26 cu. ft. side-by-side refrigerator with SpacePlus Ice System, providing more shelf space and a sleek exterior water and ice dispenser. Features LG's Linear Compressor for optimal temperature control.

name: Whirlpool Top Freezer Refrigerator
description: 18 cu. ft. top freezer refrigerator with full-width pantry drawer and adjustable wire shelves. Perfect for smaller kitchens or as a secondary refrigerator.

name: Haier Bottom Freezer Refrigerator
description: 15 cu. ft. bottom freezer refrigerator with reversible doors and quick-cool zone. Features a sleek stainless steel finish and LED lighting for energy efficiency.

name: Samsung Bespoke 4-Door Flex Refrigerator
description: 29 cu. ft. 4-door flex refrigerator with customizable exterior panels. Features a FlexZone compartment that can switch between fridge and freezer temperatures.

name: LG Counter-Depth Refrigerator
description: 23 cu. ft. counter-depth French door refrigerator with Door-in-Door feature and CustomChill drawer. Provides a built-in look without the built-in price.

name: Whirlpool Smart French Door Refrigerator
description: 28 cu. ft. smart French door refrigerator with fingerprint-resistant stainless steel finish. Features Wi-Fi connectivity and voice control compatibility.

name: Haier French Door Refrigerator
description: 20.6 cu. ft. French door refrigerator with internal water dispenser and quick-cool drawer. Features a space-saving design perfect for apartments or smaller kitchens.

name: Samsung Side-by-Side Refrigerator
description: 28 cu. ft. side-by-side refrigerator with external water and ice dispenser. Features All-Around Cooling to maintain even temperatures throughout the fridge.

name: LG Studio French Door Refrigerator
description: 24 cu. ft. built-in French door refrigerator with premium design elements. Features a panel-ready design for seamless integration with your kitchen cabinetry.

name: Whirlpool Mini Refrigerator
description: 3.1 cu. ft. mini refrigerator with freezer compartment. Perfect for dorm rooms, offices, or as a beverage cooler. Features adjustable thermostat and reversible door.

name: Haier Quad French Door Refrigerator
description: 27.8 cu. ft. quad French door refrigerator with flexible storage options. Features a convertible zone and MySpace customizable drawer for ultimate organization.
